simasahitha riyal ekschenj (paudgalika) samagama - ril simasahitha riyal estet ekschenj (pudgalika) samagama yanu kolambaa nagaraya thula mudukku saha palpath wala wasaya karana jana kotasakage niwasa prashnaya wisadima sadaha nagarika sanwardhana adhikariya, shri lanka idam godakirime ha sanwardhanaya kirime sansthawa, niwasa sanwardhana adhikariya, kolambaa maha nagara sabhawa saha nagarika sanwardhana ha pujabhumi sanwardhana amathyanshaya yatathe athi thirasara purawara wadasatahana eekabaddhawa pihitawagath hawulkara samagamaki.
